image.copyright: Horsetail Fall at sunset seen from Taft Point, Yosemite National Park, California (© Josh Miller Photography/Aurora Photos)

hotspot.desc: Sunset on a clear day in February...
hotspot.query: Can mean a spectacular show here

hotspot.desc: Photography played a big role in popularizing this natural trick of light.
hotspot.query: Amateur and professional photographers alike try to capture the “firefall” made of water

hotspot.desc: As more visitors learn of this spectacle, it's become a popular stop...
hotspot.query: For campers, hikers, and day-trippers enjoying this national park

hotspot.desc: There are many other natural wonders here...
hotspot.query: Including trees so big, people have cut tunnels through them

image.copyright: African wild dogs in Botswana (© Getty Images)

hotspot.desc: Sometimes puppies challenge our ideas...
hotspot.query: Of “cute”

hotspot.desc: When it comes to hunting prey, these dogs have a better success rate...
hotspot.query: Than a certain “king” of the jungle

hotspot.desc: One of the largest populations of these wolf-like canines lives...
hotspot.query: In the northern savannah region of this African nation

hotspot.desc: Seeing these animals in action really drives home the fact that they're dogs.
hotspot.query: They're social, playful, and fun to watch

image.copyright: Foliage, including cottonwoods, willows, sage, and rabbitbrush, in California's Owens Valley (© Marc Adamus/Aurora Photos)

hotspot.desc: An arid valley lodged between mountain ranges...
hotspot.query: Makes for some classic Western landscapes

hotspot.desc: This region was ground zero for an ambitious engineering project...
hotspot.query: And the start of the California Water Wars

hotspot.desc: A salt lake sits in an unusual basalt basin near here.
hotspot.query: The combination has created a landscape that looks like something out of science fiction

hotspot.desc: Some prefer the summery, seaside charm of Southern California.
hotspot.query: But we think the rugged wilderness in this spot has its own allure

image.copyright: Aerial view of Wall Street, New York City (© Cameron Davidson/Corbis)

hotspot.desc: Let's get down to street level...
hotspot.query: And avoid the bear while cozying up to the bull

hotspot.desc: What do pirates have do to with the establishment of the stock market?
hotspot.query: A fair amount, apparently

hotspot.desc: Some say this concrete jungle is a den of lies and corruption.
hotspot.query: At least, a recent film with Oscar buzz seems to bear that out

hotspot.desc: They say this city never sleeps.
hotspot.query: But if you get out between closing time and the early shift...

image.copyright: Lightning storm over Grand Canyon National Park, Arizona (© Scott Stulberg/Corbis)

hotspot.desc: Photographers have no shortage of raw material to work with at this national park.
hotspot.query: What happens when you send a group of them to the canyon floor?

hotspot.desc: It's surprisingly easy to find fossils in the canyon walls, but don't bother looking for dinosaur bones.
hotspot.query: The rocks here predate any known dinosaur

hotspot.desc: After the storm clears, perhaps the more daring members of your group could try out...
hotspot.query: One of the newest features on the rim of a side canyon here

hotspot.desc: We all know to get out of lightning storms for our own safety.
hotspot.query: But what really happens if you're struck by lightning?
